short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Water Reminder and Tracking Extension which shows desktop notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple and light weight extension for tracking water intake daily. The app will give you notifications on desired time intervals. You can change the notification message, notification interval, notification sound etc.
